data.name: DeleteSlide_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this slide?

data.name: EmptyRowsWillTrim
data.value: Empty rows will be removed automatically.

data.name: AutoPlay_Help
data.value: Start animating infographic as soon as it finishes loading

data.name: SpecificSlide_Help
data.value: Show only the given slide, hide all others

data.name: Error_NotImplemented_Description
data.value: We're very sorry but your web browser is currently not supported by Sprites Editor. Although, we'd like you to know that this is not because of some missing features but rather because we didn't have time to polish the editor in order for it to look amazing and work great in all modern browsers. We absolutely understand this problem and will try to bring Sprites Editor to Firefox, Opera, Internet Explorer and Safari as soon as we can. In a meantime, please use Google Chrome.

data.name: Error_NotImplemented_Description2
data.value: Again, we're very sorry. We hope that you're not too sad.

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_Bar
data.value: Every column represents a new series of data. Rows contain values for every new bar in the current series.

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_Line
data.value: Every row represents a new line. Columns contain intermediate points.

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_PieDonut
data.value: One column, each row containing a number representing a portion of data.

data.name: NoPresentationsCreated
data.value: You haven't created any infographics yet.

data.name: AboutElementLink
data.value: Linking an element to a slide will make such element clickable and will allow viewers to navigate through different parts of your infographic.

data.name: DemoMode
data.value: Demo mode! Changes will not be saved.

data.name: ImageUploadError
data.value: This image can't be uploaded. Make sure that the file is less than 1 MB in size and that you're choosing the correct format (supported formats are JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP and SVG).

data.name: ThemeUploadError
data.value: This theme can't be uploaded. Make sure the file is less than 1 MB in size and that you're choosing a CSS stylesheet as your theme.

data.name: SampleWidget
data.value: #!#!var widget = {&n_e;&t_e;&c_s_e;*&n_e;&t_e; * Renders the widget.&n_e;&t_e; * @param {jQuery} container Widget container.&n_e;&t_e; &c_e_e;&n_e;&t_e;render: function (container) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;var paragraph = $(\'&lt_e;p>\').css({ &n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;\'font-style\': \'italic\' &n_e;&t_e;&t_e;});&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;paragraph.text(\'Hello from custom widget!\');&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;container.append(paragraph);&n_e;&t_e;}&n_e;}

data.name: UnsafeContent_Description
data.value: This infographic contains some content which might be unsafe (for example, a third-party widget). Do you want to abort immediately, block unsafe content or allow it?

data.name: Component_Widget_Description
data.value: Take a look at the documentation which describes what the widget is and how to create one.

data.name: Component_Widget_Description_Short
data.value: Our documentation will help you get started.

data.name: UnpublishedPresentation
data.value: Sorry, this infographic has been unpublished.

data.name: DeleteElement_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete this element?

data.name: SyncError_Description
data.value: Looks like Sprites briefly went offline to get itself updated with new cool stuff. Please reload the page to continue.

data.name: DataImport_ExcelUploadError
data.value: This file can't be uploaded. Make sure that the file is less than 1 MB in size and that you're choosing the correct format (supported formats are XLSX and CSV).

data.name: DataImport_GoogleImportError
data.value: This spreadsheet can't be downloaded. Make sure that the URL is pointing to the published spreadsheet and that it contains some data. Also, we don't support Google Apps for Business.

data.name: DataImport_UrlImportError
data.value: This data can't be downloaded. Make sure that the URL is valid, contains some data and that the data can be understood by Sprites.

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_Area
data.value: Every row represents a new area. Columns contain intermediate points.

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_Bubble
data.value: Every row represents a bubble. Columns contain X and Y coordinate, name of the series and a bubble size.

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_TreeMap
data.value: Every row represents a new tree node. The only column contains the value (make sure to specify row labels as well).

data.name: Password_Help
data.value: Protect your infographic by setting a password

data.name: SlideToDownload_Help
data.value: Choose the slide to be downloaded

data.name: ExportImage_Error
data.value: Oops, something went wrong. Please try again in a few moments and if that doesn't help, contact us.

data.name: ExportImage_OneMomentCreatingImageDelayed
data.value: Taking a bit longer than expected. Almost there...

data.name: CreatedWithSprites
data.value: This infographic was created with Sprites. Try it yourself at https://spritesapp.com

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_Column
data.value: Every column represents a new series of data. Rows contain values for every new column in the current series.

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_StackedArea
data.value: Every row represents a new area. Columns contain intermediate points.

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_StackedBar
data.value: Every column represents a new series of data. Rows contain values for every new bar in the current series.

data.name: Component_Chart_DataFormat_StackedColumn
data.value: Every column represents a new series of data. Rows contain values for every new column in the current series.

data.name: CloneSlide_About
data.value: Cloning a slide will copy all its attributes including description, playback settings and all the elements.

data.name: Component_Map_Scale
data.value: Zoom level and offset from center (%)

data.name: ExportVideo_OneMomentCreatingVideo
data.value: Creating video, to go...

data.name: VideoLength_Help
data.value: Estimated final length of the video

data.name: AddAudio_Help
data.value: Specify the audio file to be mixed with the video

data.name: AudioFileRequirements
data.value: VMA or MP3, up to 10 MB in size. If the video is shorter than the audio, the latter will be trimmed.

data.name: AudioUploadError
data.value: This audio file can't be uploaded. Make sure that the file is less than 10 MB in size and that you're choosing the correct format (supported formats are VMA and MP3).

data.name: WidgetSnippet_Twitter
data.value: #!#!var widget = {&n_e;&t_e;&c_s_e;*&n_e;&t_e; * Renders the widget.&n_e;&t_e; * @param {jQuery} container Widget container.&n_e;&t_e; &c_e_e;&n_e;&t_e;render: function (container) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;container.append($('&lt_e;a class="twitter-timeline">').attr({&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;width: 500,&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;height: 400,&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'data-widget-id': '{param:widgetId}',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;href: 'https:/' + '/twitter.com/{param:handle}'&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}).text('One moment...'));&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;$.getScript('https:/' + '/platform.twitter.com/widgets.js', function () {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;twttr.widgets.load(container.get(0));&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;});&n_e;&t_e;}&n_e;}

data.name: WidgetSnippet_YouTube
data.value: #!#!var widget = {&n_e;&t_e;&c_s_e;*&n_e;&t_e; * Renders the widget.&n_e;&t_e; * @param {jQuery} container Widget container.&n_e;&t_e; &c_e_e;&n_e;&t_e;render: function (container) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;container.append($('&lt_e;iframe>').attr({&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;width: 640,&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;height: 360,&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;frameborder: 0,&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;type: 'text/html',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;allowfullscreen: 'true',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;src: 'https:/' + '/{param:url}'&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}));&n_e;&t_e;}&n_e;}

data.name: RealtimeData_AnyTabularData
data.value: Any tabular data structure can be used.

data.name: RealtimeData_Format
data.value: To get started, take a look at live data format for this element.

data.name: RealtimeData_PropertyRequired_Title
data.value: This property must exist in a live data feed

data.name: SpecifyElementLiveData
data.value: Connect element to live data feed

data.value: Sorry, we couldn't understand the format of the data you supplied. Fix the issue

data.value: Sorry, we couldn't understand the format of the data you supplied. Fix the issue

data.value: Supported fields (per array item)

data.name: DeleteElements_Confirm
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete all selected elements?

data.name: WidgetSnippet_Typeform
data.value: #!#!var widget = {&n_e;&t_e;&c_s_e;*&n_e;&t_e; * Renders the widget.&n_e;&t_e; * @param {jQuery} container Widget container.&n_e;&t_e; &c_e_e;&n_e;&t_e;render: function (container) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;container.append($('&lt_e;div>').attr({&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'class': 'typeform-widget',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'data-url': 'https:/' + '/{param:url}',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'data-text': ''&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}).css({&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'width': '70vw',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'height': '60vh'&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}));&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;var qs, js, q, s, d = container.get(0).ownerDocument, &n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;gi = d.getElementById, ce = d.createElement, &n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;gt = d.getElementsByTagName, id='typef_orm', &n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;b = 'https:/' + '/s3-eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/share.typeform.com/';&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;if (!gi.call(d, id)) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;js = ce.call(d,'script');&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;js.id = id;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;js.src = b + 'widget.js';&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;q = gt.call(d, 'script')[0];&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;q.parentNode.insertBefore(js, q);&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;} else if (d.defaultView['Typeform']) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;new d.defaultView['Typeform'].Widget();&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}&n_e;&t_e;}&n_e;}

data.name: DataImportSourceType_GoogleAnalytics_Authorize_Description
data.value: Please click "Allow access" below to allow Sprites to read your Google Analytics data:

data.name: RealtimeData_GoogleAnalytics_ViewIdHowTo
data.value: To get view ID, sign in to Analytics, go to "Admin" and click "View Settings" under the "View" column.

data.name: WidgetSnippet_Facebook
data.value: #!#!var widget = {&n_e;&t_e;&c_s_e;*&n_e;&t_e; * Renders the widget.&n_e;&t_e; * @param {jQuery} container Widget container.&n_e;&t_e; &c_e_e;&n_e;&t_e;render: function (container) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;var d = container.get(0).ownerDocument, s = 'script', root, node, fbr = 'fb-root',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;id = 'facebook-jssdk', url = 'https&c_wp;connect.facebook.net/en_US/sdk.js' +&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'#xfbml=1&appId=521113044653315&version=v2.0', js, fjs, outer;&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;outer = $('&lt_e;div class="widget-fb-post">');&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;outer.append($('&lt_e;fb:post>').attr({&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'href': '{param:postUrl}',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'width': '500'&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}));&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;container.append(outer);&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;if (!d.getElementById(fbr)) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;root = document.createElement('div');&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;root.id = fbr;&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;d.body.appendChild(root);&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;fjs = d.getElementsByTagName(s)[0];&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;if (!d.getElementById(id)) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;js = d.createElement(s); &n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;js.id = id;&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;js.src = url;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;fjs.parentNode.insertBefore(js, fjs);&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;} else if (d.defaultView['FB'] && d.defaultView['FB'].XFBML) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;d.defaultView['FB'].XFBML.parse(container.get(0));&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}&n_e;&t_e;}&n_e;}

data.name: WidgetSnippet_TwitterTweet
data.value: #!#!var widget = {&n_e;&t_e;&c_s_e;*&n_e;&t_e; * Renders the widget.&n_e;&t_e; * @param {jQuery} container Widget container.&n_e;&t_e; &c_e_e;&n_e;&t_e;render: function (container) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;var tweetId = '{param:tweetId}', cache = typeof (window.localStorage) !== 'undefined' ?&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;window.localStorage : null, html, keyPrefix = 'sprites.widget.', onPlatform = function () {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;twttr.widgets.load(container.get(0));&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;}, pasteTweet = function() {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;container.get(0).innerHTML = html;&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;if (typeof (twttr) !== 'undefined') {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;onPlatform();&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;} else {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;$.getScript('https&c_wp;platform.twitter.com/widgets.js', function () {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;onPlatform();&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;});&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;}&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;};&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;if (cache) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;html = cache.getItem(keyPrefix + tweetId);&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;if (!html || !html.length) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;$.ajax({&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;url: 'https&c_wp;api.twitter.com/1/statuses/oembed.json?id=' + tweetId +&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;'&hide_thread=1&omit_script=1',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;dataType: 'jsonp',&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;success: function (result) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;html = result.html;&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;if (cache) {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;cache.setItem(keyPrefix + tweetId, html);&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;}&n_e;&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;pasteTweet();&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;}&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;});&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;} else {&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;&t_e;pasteTweet();&n_e;&t_e;&t_e;}&n_e;&t_e;}&n_e;}

data.name: Video_YouTube_Upload_Title
data.value: Upload the video on YouTube upon completion

data.name: TemplateElement_Text
data.value:
Wikipedia is a free-access, free content Internet encyclopedia, supported
and hosted by the non-profit Wikimedia Foundation. Anyone who can
access the site can edit almost any of its articles.

Wikipedia is the sixth-most popular website and constitutes the
Internet's largest and most popular general reference work.

data.name: Template_FactsAndChart_Fact1_Description
data.value: comes to Wikipedia via various search engines.

data.name: Template_FactsAndFigure_Fact1_Description
data.value: are currently on Wikipedia available for everyone.

data.name: Template_FactsAndFigure_FigureText
data.value:
Of the 34 million articles, 4.6 million of them
are written in the English language.

data.name: Template_TitleAndChart_Description
data.value: Distribution by country, as of November 2014.

data.name: NotSupporterBrowser_Description
data.value: Looks like you are using web browser which we don't currently support. Feel free to switch to either Chrome or Firefox for the best Sprites editor experience.

data.name: BackgroundImageUploadError
data.value: This background image can't be uploaded. Make sure that the file is less than 1 MB in size and that you're choosing the correct format (supported formats are JPG, PNG, GIF and BMP).

data.name: Collaboration_RemoveCollaborator
data.value: Remove this person from the list of collaborators

data.name: SharedWithMe
data.value: Infographics that are shared with me

data.name: Chat_Empty
data.value: Start a conversation by sharing this infographic with your teammates.

data.name: Collaboration_About_Text
data.value: The collaborators will be able to view and edit the given infographic. If the person does not have a Sprites account, he will be asked to create one first. You may revoke collaborator access at any time.

data.name: SelectImage_ShareWarning_Drive
data.value: You've selected a file from Google Drive. Make sure it's shared publicly.

data.name: Video_SendTo_Facebook_Title
data.value: Automatically upload to Facebook upon completion

data.name: Video_SendTo_YouTube_Title
data.value: Automatically upload to YouTube upon completion

data.name: Present_Animations_Help
data.value: Choose how rich the animations should be when you are presenting

data.name: GoFullScreen_Question
data.value: Would you like to go fullscreen?

data.name: Present_AllowFullscreen_Help
data.value: Allow Sprites to ask to go fullscreen

data.name: VideoPlaybackHint
data.value: Video not playing? Choose medium quality.

data.name: CreateTheme_Confirmation
data.value: Name it and start using it!

data.name: CreateTheme_Confirmation_Description
data.value: Finally, give your theme a good name and click "Create theme" to add it to Sprites.

data.name: CreateTheme_Customization_Description
data.value: Personalize your theme by changing font, accent colors and background.

data.name: CreateTheme_SelectTemplate_Description
data.value: Pick an existing theme that you like most. You'll be able to customize it in the next step.

data.name: FontPreviewText
data.value: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

data.name: FontSelector_SearchTip
data.value: Start typing to search for fonts.

data.name: CreateTheme_NameIsNotUnique
data.value: There's already a theme with this name. It will be overwritten by the current one.

data.name: Help_CloneSlide
data.value: Copies the title and all the elements from the current slide and puts them onto the new one.

data.name: Help_CloneInfographic
data.value: Copies the title, theme and all the slides from the current infographic and puts them onto the new one.

data.name: VoiceOver_MicrophoneRequred
data.value: Please allow Sprites to use microhpone.

data.name: VoiceOver_MicrophoneRequredError
data.value: Can't use your microphone. Please check web page media settings.

data.name: Help_CheckIndex
data.value: Check table of contents for complete list of help topics.

data.name: Help_NoTopic_Description
data.value:
Thanks for checking in. This particular help topic has not been put together yet but we are working on it!

In the meantime, don't hesitate to email us at contact@spritesapp.com and we will help you out!

data.name: Help_Welcome_Description
data.value: Sprites is a tool for creating beautiful and engaging infographics and online presentations.

data.name: Help_NoSearchResults_Description
data.value: No topics match your search. Maybe, try out different keywords?

data.name: Help_EmailUs
data.value: Still have a question? Get in touch!
